resources.string:
Welcome to our News App!
Stay up-to-date with the latest news from around the world. Whether you're interested in business, entertainment, health, science, sports, or technology, this app has you covered.

Key Features:
- Browse news articles from various categories.
- Tap an article to open it in your web browser.
- Long-press an article to add it to your favorites for quick access.

This app helps u too stay informed with the latest news!
Tap to open in browser \nLong press to add to favorites
